Title: Relates to broadband mapping and expansion of such service
Summary: Requires the Empire State Development corporation's broadband program office to assist in the provision and expansion of broadband internet access service and to address inequities in the availability of such service.
LawCode: Add Art 23 ยง450, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to directing the empire state development corporation to publish and maintain a map reflecting the aggregation of information broadband providers are submitting in the ongoing FCC mapping proceeding
